comments.en:
This printer is the same as the HP DeskJet 882C, see also the information there.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver.

Older comments:

There is now a driver specifically for this printer; after a bit more tuning this printer will qualify for working "perfectly".

With the cdj880 driver, it works well, but the colors are slightly light overall. It needs to be corrected with -dGammaValC, -dGammaValM, -dGammaValY -dGammaValK and result can be nicely improved.
